GameConditionDef.label: solar flare
GameConditionDef.description:
A solar flare has begun.

While this solar flare will not disable electronic devices, it will quickly heat all exposed surfaces, potentially causing heatstroke and fires.

It should pass in about a day.

GameConditionDef.label: gravitational anomaly
GameConditionDef.description: A powerful gravity distortion has enveloped your gravship, preventing any kind of launch until it subsides. The anomaly will remain for the next few days before naturally fading away. Until then, all gravship launch rituals are unavailable and the ship will be unable to move from this location.\n\nWhile the anomaly persists, your systems will passively collect gravdata, but only if an active gravship research project is selected.

GameConditionDef.label: comet
GameConditionDef.description: A massive comet is passing nearby, its brilliant tail lighting up the void around your gravship. The spectacle inspires awe among the crew, raising their spirits until it will fade from view.
GameConditionDef.letterText: A massive comet is passing nearby, its brilliant tail lighting up the void around your gravship. The spectacle inspires awe among the crew, raising their spirits until it will fade from view.

GameConditionDef.label: micrometeor storm
GameConditionDef.description: A micrometeor storm is pelting the area with tiny, high-velocity debris. Exposed structures and people are slowly damaged by the constant bombardment.\n\nThe storm is expected to last about a day.
GameConditionDef.letterText: A micrometeor storm is pelting the area with tiny, high-velocity debris. Exposed structures and people are slowly damaged by the constant bombardment.\n\nThe storm is expected to last about a day.

GameConditionDef.label: space debris
GameConditionDef.description: A drifting cloud of ancient wreckage has crossed our flight path. Pieces of metal and scrap hurtle past the ship. Some will miss, others might not.\n\nThe debris will pass us by in about 12 hours.
GameConditionDef.letterText: A drifting cloud of ancient wreckage has crossed our flight path. Pieces of metal and scrap hurtle past the ship. Some will miss, others might not.\n\nThe debris will pass us by in about 12 hours.

GameConditionDef.label: asteroid shower
GameConditionDef.description: An asteroid shower has crossed into your gravship’s sector. Countless fragments of vacstone streak across the void, some slamming into the hull with explosive force. Most will burn away or miss, but not all.
GameConditionDef.letterText: An asteroid shower has crossed into your gravship’s sector. Countless fragments of vacstone streak across the void, some slamming into the hull with explosive force. Most will burn away or miss, but not all.

GameConditionDef.label: dust cloud
GameConditionDef.description: A dense cosmic dust cloud has drifted across your sector, shrouding your gravship in particulate haze. Visibility is almost zero, and targeting systems are struggling to lock onto anything. The dust will eventually clear as the cloud drifts away.
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The dust cloud started to disperse.

GameConditionDef.label: toxic dust cloud
GameConditionDef.description: A drifting cloud of highly toxic cosmic dust has enveloped your gravship. Microscopic particulates are seeping into every exposed space, corroding surfaces and poisoning the crew. The dust cloud will persist only briefly, but its effects are immediate and dangerous.
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The toxic dust cloud started to disperse.
